original: Theravāda Vinaya
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Mahāvibhaṅga
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga

original: Pācittiyakaṇḍa
analyzed: pācittiyakaṇḍa

original: Musāvādavagga
analyzed: musā vāda vagga

original: 6. Dutiyasahaseyyasikkhāpada
analyzed: dutiya sahaseyya sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchanto sāyaṁ aññataraṁ gāmaṁ upagacchi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu janapade sāvatthim gacchantaḥ sāyam aññataram gāmam upagacchi

original: Tena kho pana samayena tasmiṁ gāme aññatarissā itthiyā āvasathāgāraṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena tasmin gāme aññatarissā itthiyāḥ āvasathāgāram paññattam hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—“sace te, bhagini, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṁ āvasathāgāre”ti.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai anuruddhaḥ yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam itthim etat avoca sace te bhagini agaru vaseyyāmaḥ eka rattam āvasatha āgāre iti

original: “Vaseyyātha, bhante”ti.
analyzed: vaseyyātha bhanta iti

original: Aññepi addhikā yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ itthiṁ etadavocuṁ—“sace te, ayye, agaru vaseyyāma ekarattaṁ āvasathāgāre”ti.
analyzed: aññe pi addhikāḥ yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā tam itthim etat avocuḥ sace te ayye agaru vaseyyāmaḥ eka rattam āvasatha āgāre iti

original: “Eso kho ayyo samaṇo paṭhamaṁ upagato; sace so anujānāti, vaseyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: esaḥ kho ayyaḥ samaṇaḥ paṭhamam upagataḥ sace saḥ anujānāti vaseyyātha ati

original: Atha kho te addhikā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ—“sace te, bhante, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṁ āvasathāgāre”ti.
analyzed: atha kho te addhikāḥ yena āyasmai anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avocuḥ sace te bhante agaru vaseyyāmaḥ eka rattam āvasatha āgāra iti

original: “Vaseyyātha, āvuso”ti.
analyzed: vaseyyātha āvuso ti

original: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmante anuruddhe saha dassanena paṭibaddhacittā ahosi.
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī āyasmante anuruddhe saha dassanena paṭibaddha cittā ahosi

original: Atha kho sā itthī yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca—“ayyo, bhante, imehi manussehi ākiṇṇo na phāsu viharissati.
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī yena āyasmai anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca ayyaḥ bhante imehi manussehi ākiṇṇaḥ na phāsu viharissati

original: Sādhāhaṁ, bhante, ayyassa mañcakaṁ abbhantaraṁ paññapeyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhā aha bhante ayyassa mañcakam abbhantaram paññapeyyanti

original: Adhivāsesi kho āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi kho āyasmai anuruddhaḥ tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmato anuruddhassa mañcakaṁ abbhantaraṁ paññapetvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattā
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa mañcakam abbhantaram paññapetvā alaṅkata ppaṭiyattā

original: gandhagandhinī yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: gandha gandhinī yena ayasmai anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “ayyo, bhante, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko, ahañcamhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
analyzed: ayyaḥ bhante abhirūpaḥ dassanīyaḥ pāsādikaḥ aham ca amhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā

original: Sādhāhaṁ, bhante, ayyassa pajāpati bhaveyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhā āha bhante ayyassa pajāpati bhaveyyanti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi

original: Dutiyampi kho …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho pe

original: tatiyampi kho sā itthī āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho sā itthī āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “ayyo, bhante, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko, ahañcamhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
analyzed: ayyaḥ bhante abhirūpaḥ dassanīyaḥ pāsādikaḥ aham ca amhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā

original: Sādhu, bhante, ayyo mañceva paṭicchatu sabbañca sāpateyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante ayyaḥ mama ca iva paṭicchatu sabban ca sāpateyyanti

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho āyasmai anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi

original: Atha kho sā itthī sāṭakaṁ nikkhipitvā āyasmato anuruddhassa purato caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī sāṭakam nikkhipitvā āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa puratas caṅkamati pi tiṭṭhati pi nisīdati pi seyyampi kappeti

original: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho indriyāni okkhipitvā taṁ itthiṁ neva olokesi napi ālapi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai anuruddhaḥ indriyāni okkhipitvā tam itthim na iva olokesi na pi ālapi

original: Atha kho sā itthī—“acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Bahū me manussā satenapi sahassenapi pahiṇanti.
analyzed: bahū me manussā satena api sahassena api pahiṇanti

original: Ayaṁ pana samaṇo—mayā sāmaṁ yāciyamāno—na icchati mañceva paṭicchituṁ sabbañca sāpateyyan”ti
analyzed: ayam pana samaṇa umayā sāmam yāciyamāna ūnaḥ icchati mañca iva paṭicchitum sabbam ca sāpateyyanti

original: sāṭakaṁ nivāsetvā āyasmato anuruddhassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: sāṭakam nivāsetvā āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “accayo maṁ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ yāhaṁ evamakāsiṁ.
analyzed: accayaḥ ma bhante accagamāḥ yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathāakusalam yā aham evam akāsi

original: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
analyzed: tassāḥ me bhante ayyaḥ accayam accayataḥ paṭiggaṇhātu āyatim savarāya ati

original: “Taggha tvaṁ, bhagini, accayo accagamā yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ yā tvaṁ evamakāsi.
analyzed: tat ha tva bhagini accayaḥ accagamā yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathāakusalam yā tvam evam akāsi

original: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, bhagini, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi, taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
analyzed: yatas ca kho tva bhagini accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikarosi tam te mayam paṭiggaṇhāma

original: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti āyatiñca saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
analyzed: vuddhi ha isā bhagini ariyassa vinaye yaḥ accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikaroti āyatim ca savaram āpajjati iti

original: Atha kho sā itthī tassā rattiyā accayena āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī tassā rattiyāḥ accayena āyasmantam anuruddham paṇītena khādanīyena

original: bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ
analyzed: bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā āyasmantam anuruddham bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇi

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho taṁ itthiṁ āyasmā anuruddho dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho tam itthim āyasmai anuruddhaḥ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho sā itthī—āyasmatā anuruddhena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā—āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī āyasmatā anuruddhena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bhante, abhikkantaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante abhikkanta bhante

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya—‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ ayyena anuruddhena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam ayyena anuruddhena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, taṁ bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aha bhante tam bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsikaṁ maṁ ayyo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsikam mam ayyaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai anuruddhaḥ sāvatthim gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappessatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai anuruddhaḥ mātugāmena saha seyyam kappessati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam anuruddham aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, anuruddha, mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva anuruddha mātugāmena sahaseyyam kappesi iti

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe… kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, anuruddha, mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappessasi.
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavā pe katham hi nāma tva anuruddha mātugāmena saha seyyam kappessasi

original: Netaṁ, anuruddha, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: neta anuruddha appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saha seyyam kappeyya pācittiyanti

original: Yo panāti
analyzed: yaḥ panāti

original: yo yādiso …pe…
analyzed: yaḥ ya ādisaḥ pe

original: bhikkhūti
analyzed: bhikkhū ti

original: …pe… ayaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
analyzed: pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: Mātugāmo nāma
analyzed: mātugāmaḥ nāma

original: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā; antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā, pageva mahattarī.
analyzed: manussitthī na yakkhī na petī na tiracchāna gatā antamasaḥ tad ahu jātā api dārikā pagā iva mahattarī

original: Sahāti
analyzed: saha ati

original: ekato.
analyzed: ekatas

original: Seyyā nāma
analyzed: seyyā nāma

original: sabbacchannā, sabbaparicchannā, yebhuyyenacchannā, yebhuyyena paricchannā.
analyzed: sabba channā sabba paricchannā yebhuyyena channā yebhuyyena paricchannā

original: Seyyaṁ kappeyyāti
analyzed: seyyam kappeyya ati

original: atthaṅgate sūriye—
analyzed: atthaṅgate sūriye

original: Mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Bhikkhu nipanne mātugāmo nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu nipanne mātugāmaḥ nipajjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ubho vā nipajjanti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ubho vā nipajjanti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Uṭṭhahitvā punappunaṁ nipajjanti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā punappunam nipajjanti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Mātugāme mātugāmasaññī sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme mātugāma saññī sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Mātugāme vematiko sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme vematikaḥ sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Mātugāme amātugāmasaññī sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme a mātugāma saññī sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: upaḍḍha channe upaḍḍha paricchanne āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatitthiyā vā sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānaga titthiyā vā sahaseyyam kappeti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Amātugāme mātugāmasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: a mātugāme mātugāma saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Amātugāme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: a mātu gāme vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Amātugāme amātugāmasaññī, anāpatti.
analyzed: a mātugāme a mātugāma saññī anāpatti

original: Anāpatti—
analyzed: anāpatti

original: sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanne,
analyzed: sabba channe sabba aparicchanne

original: sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne,
analyzed: sabba paricchanne sabba a channe

original: yebhuyyena acchanne,
analyzed: yebhuyyena a channe

original: yebhuyyena aparicchanne,
analyzed: yebhuyyena aparicchanne

original: mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nisīdati,
analyzed: mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nisīdati

original: bhikkhu nipanne mātugāmo nisīdati,
analyzed: bhikkhu nipanne mātugāmaḥ nisīdati

original: ubho vā nisīdanti,
analyzed: ubhau vā nisīdanti

original: ummattakassa,
analyzed: ummattakassa

original: ādikammikassāti.
analyzed: ādikammikassa ati

original: Dutiyasahaseyyasikkhāpadaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: dutiya sahaseyya sikkhāpadam niṭṭhitam chaṭṭha
